name: Rescue
description: Aliens are attacking the research station. As the security chief you have to guide the scientists to the rescue ship, along with their experiments, when they each wake up and start running around. Rescue as many as you can, because one of them has the answer to winning the whole war, but you don't know which. And don't forget to collect fuel for the trip.

shot.caption: Title screen builds up from text squirted in from the edge
Title page. The Mastertronic logo is colour-cycling
Easter Egg screen, accessed from title screen by pressing SHIFT-BREAK. Screen shows the boot-screen from a Tatung Einstein computer
Starting screen, in spaceship control room
Airlock entrance near the spaceship. You'll need all 3 of those steel doors for protection...
2 aliens busy destroying base supplies
Smoking boots are all that remain of this dead scientist. His protective doors both taken off at the hinges by the aliens
Alien has broken through one door here and is busy damaging the next, to get at your medical supplies. While they're attached and destroying something they can't see you.
This is some of the fuel you need for the escape ship
This scientist is awake and running round. Open the door, pick up his experiment, then guide him to the spaceship
Trying to guide a running scientists, green alien teleporting in nearby and will attack soon
One scientist safely guided to the rescue ship and now hibernating, along with his experiment. 8 more to go...
Your shots can be steered, but they also bounce off the blue 45-degree metal plates
Got here just in time, green alien breaking down the door to a scientist's room...
Different aliens, including a tank here that your weapons have no affect on
Medical syringes denote healing stations. Player also has a backup medikit installed ( centre top ) as backup. Carrying 2 ammo packs, a crate and a bomb
So many teleports to choose from, learning where they all go is crucial to getting around the map quickly
Bullet-proof tank beaming in, which is also blocking the passage. Note broken syringe for medi-station destroyed by aliens to stop you healing as easily.
Tank finished teleporting and now attacking you - run!
The animated / noisy game-over screen
Report screen after 'Game Over', showing achievements ( or lack thereof )
